thread.title: This Actress Will Do A Cameo In Rajkumar Hirani’s Upcoming Biopic
thread.title_full: This Actress Will Do A Cameo In Rajkumar Hirani’s Upcoming Biopic

title: This Actress Will Do A Cameo In Rajkumar Hirani’s Upcoming Biopic
text:
facebook 142 SHARES 
We all know Rajkumar Hirani is making a biopic on his favourite actor, Sanjay Dutt. Well, it is heard that actress Anushka Sharma will do a cameo in the movie. Anushka has worked with Hirani in the film PK , hence when the filmmaker asked her to play a short role in the movie, she readily agreed. "Anushka hasn't done any special appearances for anyone so far, but she loves and respects Raju sir a lot. Hence, she agreed to do the cameo. She has already begun shooting for her part," says an insider. 
The source further adds that Anushka will be finishing the shoot in just five to six days. Actor Ranbir Kapoor will be playing the role of Sanjay Dutt in the film, while Sonam Kapoor will play the lead actress opposite him. Photo Credit: BCCL
